title: A Sheet of Figure Studies
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Ex.Coll: Deglatigny (Lugt.suppl.1768a). Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, Colonia, NJ, by June 12, 1974; their gift to Museum, December 1975.

Notes:
[1]. The Fishkoffs loaned the work to the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in June 1974; see curatorial file for original loan form and list of works.
